CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 14, 1945, pg. 1 reads: "In Action ! - Pittsburgh joined the parade for democracy this week as colored men began training to become street car and bus operators...Samuel McKay, 309 Neville Street, is shown operating one of the transit company's streamlined cars in center photo... - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Samuel McKay operating Pittsburgh Railways streetcar, possibly 37 Shannon line
